      • WeekDayName

        public static java.lang.String WeekDayName(int MyWeekDay,
                           java.lang.String sLangId)
        Get translated week day name
        Parameters:
        MyWeekDay - [1=Sunday .. 7=Saturday]
        sLangId - 2 characters language identifier (currently only { "en","es","it","fr","de" and "pt" } are supported)
        Returns:
        Week day name

      • MonthName

        public static java.lang.String MonthName(int MyMonth,
                         java.lang.String sLangId)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get translated month name
        Parameters:
        MyMonth - [0=January .. 11=December]
        sLangId - sLangId 2 characters language identifier (currently only { "en","es","it","fr","de" and "pt" } are supported)
        Returns:
        Month Name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sLangId is not one of {es, en, fr, it, de, pt}

      • LastDay

        public static int LastDay(int MyMonth,
          int MyYear)
        Get Month Last Day
        Parameters:
        MyMonth - [0=January .. 11=December]
        MyYear - 4 digits year
        Returns:
        the last day of the month. Takes into account leap years
